name: Heroes of Might and Magic 3
description: Turn-based strategy fantasy game. Destroy your opponents and retake Erathia.

name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Skyrim
description: Become the Dragonborn and help defend Skyrim from rising dragons.

name: Fallout 4
description: Leaving Vault 111, find your way across the Wasteland to find someone you lost.

name: Terraria
description: Enter the 2D world of blocks, monsters and adventure.

name: Wolfenstein: The New Order
description: Play as B. J. Blazkowicz and try to rebuild the resistance after USA's defeat in the World War II.

name: Watch Dogs
description: Play as Aiden Pearce, a lonesome vigilant in Chicago's streets, using his tech skills as well as his weapons to fight the ever-present crime.
